payload.name: sensemaking-frame-building
payload.core: Determine 'what kind of situation is this?' by building frames that organize signals, priorities, and actions under ambiguity. Precedes most other modes by selecting what counts as relevant evidence and what questions to ask.
out: situation frame: named pattern characterizing the situation type
working hypotheses: 2-3 candidate interpretations ranked by fit
shared mental model: stakeholder-aligned problem representation
interpretive structure: lens for filtering signals and prioritizing actions
proc: gather signals: list anomalies, constraints, stakeholder concerns, available data
generate candidate frames: name 2-4 situation types this could be
test frame fit: for each frame, note what it explains and what it ignores
select working frame: choose best-fit frame, note key assumptions
derive implications: what actions, questions, and evidence follow from this frame
set frame-revision triggers: define signals that would force reframing
check: selected frame explicitly named and characterized
downstream actions follow logically from frame
stakeholders can articulate frame in their own words

diff.abductive: abductive generates hypotheses; sensemaking selects which problem space to hypothesize within
diff.hermeneutic: hermeneutic interprets meaning of signals; sensemaking organizes which signals matter
diff.meta-reasoning: meta-reasoning selects reasoning mode; sensemaking establishes what problem is before mode selection
diff.diagnostic: diagnostic identifies root cause within a frame; sensemaking chooses the frame first

fail.name: premature frame lock-in
signals: first frame adopted without considering alternatives
perfect reasoning inside frame yielding wrong answers
mitigations: name current frame explicitly so it can be questioned
ask 'what would make us reframe?' before proceeding
test frame with red team or outsider perspective

ex.situation: Sales suddenly down 30% in key region, no obvious cause
ex.selected_frame: market shift (new regulation changing buyer behavior)
ex.key_assumption: regulation impact is structural, not temporary
ex.revision_trigger: if competitor analysis shows new entrant, reframe to competitive threat
ex.outcome: frame validated; pivoted product positioning to new compliance requirements
